name: Troll World: Meme Adventure
description:
TO TROLL OR TO BE TROLLED, THAT IS THE QUESTION
Join Troll on his wacky quest to solve all the trickiest riddles ever! His meme adventure is filled with dangers and troubles that you need to master your skills to outsmart the sneakiest bad guys, pass enraging obstacles and leave no mind-bending puzzles unsolved.
Challenge your brain with this ultimate pranking adventure and become a brain teaser master. If you think you have what it takes give it a try. Your intelligence and your reflexes will be tested with the MOVE and JUMP gameplay while using your mind for insane puzzles.
How many lives will you lose before clearing all the levels? There's only one way to find out. There are a lot of troll traps placed where you wouldn't expect. You will fail a lot, but finally clearing a level feels so good.

HOW TO PLAY
- Simple yet fun gameplay: move left, right, and jump.
- Master your reflexes and skills to avoid wacky obstacles: spike traps, moving spikes, and your lifelong enemies The Red Trolls.
- Don't misstep and fall into the abyss below.
- And most importantly, train your brain to find clues and solve all the mind-bending riddles.

FEATURES
- 40 challenging levels that excite you with no repetition.
- Endless fun mini-games full of hysterically mind-blowing riddles and teasers.
- Earn gold coins along the way to get your favorite Troll characters.
- Unique minimalistic graphics and awesome animation.
- Funny background music and cool sound effects that squeek and eek when you jump or fall.
- Provide you with easy hints to solve the puzzles.

Are you the brainiest player of all time? Troll your way around this wacky world and find out!
